name: Web3 Community Model Canvas by frens
description:
This template is designed to help anyone developing community for NFT, DeFi, DAOs and other Web3-oriented community projects.


This template helps community creators and moderators focus in on who their community is, what they need, and how they can best grow and engage their community much in the same way the business model canvas helps startups to think their startup idea through.


For more information, see frens.place and to discuss Web3 communities, join our discord at https://discord.gg/2Y22DyNjy3 and follow us on twitter.
